name: Super Hot Potato
description:
Overview

A self aware Super Hot Potato is on a quest to free his fellow potato kind from their imminent doom.
Help Super Hot Potato navigate treacherous screens filled with obstacles, collecting potato's and finally making your way to each screens exit.

Move Super Potato in a range of 4 different directions at 2 different speeds and time each movement to perfection to avoid being a Super Squished Potato.

This game will need expert timing and precision to beat, only the Hottest Hot Super Hot Potato will make it!

Good luck!

Features

Retro inspired 80s style gameplay.
Simplistic 4 way directional inputs.
Grid Based movement.
40 Levels to challenge your ability.
Save/Load your progress.
Controller support.
